titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to issue an air worthiness directive related to dense and continuous smoke in aircraft.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4633-4634)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 4/19/1993--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of Transportation to issue an air worthiness directive that provides for the removal of dense and continuous smoke from the flight deck of turbine engine powered aircraft to ensure pilot vision during emergency situations.
